message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $115.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can make you an even better deal of $100 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to go down to $110. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still holding out for a bit more. I'm willing to go down to $108. This is my final offer before I consider selling to John.
Alice, I see you're firm on your last offer of $108. Considering your original price was $120, I'll make one last attempt at $107. Let me know if this works for you.
